about_the_game:
IronOak Games and John Robert Matz are proud to present the soundtrack to “For The King II”, the highly anticipated sequel to the hugely popular rogue-lite RPG, “For The King”.

Experience the adventure, combat, thrills and glory (without the terror of unfortunate dice rolls), all crafted into a unique listening experience to be enjoyed from the comfort of the personal audio device of choice.

“Returning to Fahrul’s inspiring fantasy world has been a dream, and with this score, I’ve pushed myself harder, learning and playing literally dozens of new period and folk instruments, all to bring Fahrul’s sophomore outing to life more vibrantly than ever before. I hope you enjoy what we’ve all crafted here at IronOak, listen in good health.”
- John Robert Matz


Composed, orchestrated, performed, produced and mixed by John Robert Matz.

Lyrics by John Robert Matz. Mastered by Alec Justice at Emperia Sound and Music in Los Angeles. Album artwork by Gordon Moran (IronOak Games), Ranj Vekaria (Curve Games) and Tiffany Ingro.

Special thanks to Garrett Steele, Robby Duguay and Thomas Kresge.

I hope you enjoy what we’ve all crafted here at IronOak, listen in good health.”

Lyrics by John Robert Matz. Mastered by Alec Justice at Emperia Sound and Music in Los Angeles. Album artwork by Gordon Moran (IronOak Games), Ranj Vekaria (Curve Games) and Tiffany Ingro.
